title: Prashant Kishor likely to join Congress, final word in a week - Hindustan Times
content: Prashant Kishor likely to join Congress, final word in a week  Hindustan TimesView Full coverage on Google News
description: One of the key things that Kishor said that the opposition can focus on was states and regional allies. He pointed out that whether it was Madhya Pradesh or Uttar Pradesh, the BJP had had to fight a tough battle even though the eventual outcome was a win for them.
